00027 FXDEFMAP(RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer) DeleteServerMap[]={
00028   //____Message_Type_____________ID_______________Message_Handler_______
00029   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::ID_NYI, RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::onNotYetImplemented),
00030   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::ID_BTN_CANCEL, RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::onCancelClicked),
00031   FXMAPFUNC(SEL_COMMAND, RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::ID_BTN_OK, RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::onOkClicked),
00032 
00033 };

00035 FXIMPLEMENT(RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer,FXDialogBox,DeleteServerMap,ARRAYNUMBER(DeleteServerMap));

00047 RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::DeleteServer(FXApp *a, FXString serverName)
00048   :FXDialogBox(a, "Delete selected server", 
00049                DECOR_TITLE|DECOR_BORDER|DECOR_RESIZE)
00050 {
00051   this->serverName=serverName;
00052 
00053   // The root frame
00054   FXVerticalFrame *root =new FXVerticalFrame(this,LAYOUT_FILL_X|LAYOUT_FILL_Y);
00055 
00056   FXString lab1="You are about to delete this server.\n"
00057     "Click OK to delete it ot Cancel.";
00058   FXLabel* labHelp=new FXLabel(root, lab1, 0, LABEL_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00059 
00060   // The buttons
00061   FXHorizontalFrame *btnFrame = new FXHorizontalFrame(root,LAYOUT_FILL_X);
00062   FXuint btnOpts= LAYOUT_RIGHT|BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH ;
00063   FXint btnWidth=120;
00064   FXButton* btn1=new FXButton( btnFrame, "Cancel", NULL, this, 
00065                                ID_BTN_CANCEL, btnOpts, 0, 0, btnWidth);
00066   btn1->setDefault(true);
00067   FXButton* btn2=new FXButton( btnFrame, "OK", NULL, this, ID_BTN_OK, 
00068                                BUTTON_NORMAL|LAYOUT_FIX_WIDTH, 0, 0, btnWidth);
00069 
00070 }

00117 long RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::
00118 onCancelClicked(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00119   handle(this, FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND, FXDialogBox::ID_CANCEL), NULL);
00120   return 1;
00121 }

00133 long RainbruRPG::Gui::DeleteServer::
00134 onOkClicked(FXObject * o,FXSelector s,void* v){
00135   LOGI("OK button clicked");
00136 
00137   std::string name(serverName.text());
00138 
00139   CurlServerDelete csd;
00140   csd.setName(name);
00141   bool per=csd.perform();
00142 
00143   if (per){
00144     LOGI("The form was correctly posted");
00145   }
00146   else{
00147     HttpResponse hr;
00148     long resp=csd.getServerResponse();
00149     const char* mes=hr.getMessage(resp);
00150     LOGCATS("HTTP rsponse :");
00151     LOGCATS(mes);
00152   }
00153 
00154   handle(this, FXSEL(SEL_COMMAND, FXDialogBox::ID_ACCEPT), NULL);
00155   return 1;
00156 }
